original_text: And, behold, two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus, which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs.
korean_text: 그 날에 그들 중 둘이 예루살렘에서 이십오 리 되는 엠마오라 하는 마을로 가면서

sentences.original_text: And, behold, two of them went
sentences.korean_translation: 그때, 보라, 그들 중 두 사람이 갔으니

sentences.original_text: that same day to a village
which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs.
